config-localsettings-upgrade: Hiji berkas LocalSettings.php kapanggih. Pikeun apgréd ngamutahirkeun ieu instalasi, mangga asupkeun sandi $wgUpgradeKey kana kotak di handap. Anjeun bisa manggihan sandina di LocalSettings.php.
config-localsettings-cli-upgrade: Hiji berkas LocalSettings.php geus kabaca. Pikeun apgréd ieu instalasi, mangga jalankeun update.php
mainpagedocfooter: Mangga tingal ''[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Localisation#Translation_resources documentation on customizing the interface]'' jeung [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Contents Tungtunan Pamaké] pikeun pitulung maké jeung konfigurasi.
